content: 2 lots of fractionals up for grabs**bids will work on the LIFO system as seen in previous auctionsie: 1 @ xxBTC, up to the maximum amount of items per lot**LOT 1: 4x 2017 Satori chips (all loaded with 0.001BTC)#037026: https://blockchain.info/address/14b7pwb6D1YwmfU4GVYd5csEG6N4k4BxgZ#037028: https://blockchain.info/address/1LPZ2buHorAVstMtjDGtNyPwSRaYQA3NJK#037029: https://blockchain.info/address/14YgtwnYJtjpM9jK4KJgoYENEgwHZdft1K#037032: https://blockchain.info/address/189aAHaM9iBgbbZWAY1d5W2Xt92C6BUjDkLOT 2: 3x 2018 Moonbits 1k bits chips (all loaded with 0.001BTC)#T2592: https://blockchain.info/address/14KSpfiRH1gc7afrXERfp97CEKwKjJeUTs#T2593: https://blockchain.info/address/19nWJLuv1G67544ei7UseDUo7QstpwzwXy#T2594: https://blockchain.info/address/1F8y61HRHKHxG4dLCrDsHPMD5HBfHUtRiTSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 26th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
